Name: Blitz in the Paper Kingdom
About the game: Blitz in the Paper Kingdom is a refreshing new tower defense experience. The paper kingdom is under attack from the evil Vilmos! His aim is to send his fast hordes of minions to destroy the sacred statues spread across the kingdom. Take control of one of 4 heroes to put a stop to his evil scheme! Travel through 25 levels in a sketchbook come to life in this tower defense game. Take control of your character and upgrade your towers. Play solo or up to 4-player in local co-op. Earn in-game currency to unlock new characters, costumes, gallery items and more! Increase the speed multiplier as well as the enemy count multiplier to hit new high scores. Support for Blitz in the Paper Kingdom will continue for the foreseeable future, adding polish, content and more. Features: Single player campaign and arcade mode 4 player local co-op and remote play in both campaign and arcade Full support for PS4, PS5, Xbox 360, Xbox One, Xbox Series X and more controllers 25 playable levels 4 playable characters, with unlockable costumes, additional playable characters, features and more Your characterâ€™s speed, power & more can be upgraded during a match and are reset afterwards The game speed and enemy counts can be multiplied to add challenge and boost your score
